links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

wikitext.*:
'''Valandil''' means "Devoted to the [[Valar]]" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[-ndil]]'', "friend, lover, devoted to") and may refer to:

* [[Valandil (Lord of Andúnië)|Valandil]] (born {{SA|630}}), the first [[Lords of Andúnië|Lord of Andúnië]].
* [[Valandil (King of Arnor)|Valandil]] ({{SA|3430}} - {{TA|249}}), youngest son of [[Isildur]] and third [[Kings of Arnor|King]] of [[Arnor]].
* [[Valandil (The Lost Road)|Valandil]], the father or brother of [[Elendil]] in the earlier stages of the [[legendarium]].

* [[Valandil (The Rings of Power)|Valandil]], an original character created for the television series ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''.
